Package commands

Class ClientCommands

  • java.lang.Object
    • commands.ClientCommands
  • public class ClientCommands
extends java.lang.Object
    The class containing the client commands following the protocol specified to us in the project description!

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ClientCommands()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.lang.String cHELLO​(java.lang.String description, java.lang.String... extension)
      The method responsible for returning the hello message which is to be sent by the client to the server.
      static java.lang.String cLIST()
      The method responsible for returning the LIST message which is to be sent by the client to the server to request a list of online users.
      static java.lang.String cLOGIN​(java.lang.String username)
      The method responsible for returning the login message which is to be sent by the client to the server to successfully log in to the server following the protocol specified.
      static java.lang.String cMOVE​(int index, int rotate)
      The method responsible for returning the MOVE message which is to be sent by the client to the server to play a move in the pentago game!
      static java.lang.String cPING()
      The method responsible for returning the PING message which is to be sent by the client to the server to check active connection.
      static java.lang.String cPONG()
      The method responsible for returning the PONG message which is to be sent by the client to the server to check active connection.
      static java.lang.String cQUEUE()
      The method responsible for returning the QUEUE message which is to be sent by the client to the server to request get into a QUEUE to start the Pentago game!
      static java.lang.String cQUIT()
      The method responsible for returning the QUIT message which is to be sent by the client to quit the connection to the server.
      static java.lang.String cRANK()

    • Method Detail

      • cHELLO

        public static java.lang.String cHELLO​(java.lang.String description,
                                      java.lang.String... extension)
        The method responsible for returning the hello message which is to be sent by the client to the server.
        Parameters:
        description - - The client description
        extension - - The extensions the client supports
        Returns:
        a String which contains the hello message to be sent according to the protocol

      • cLOGIN

        public static java.lang.String cLOGIN​(java.lang.String username)
        The method responsible for returning the login message which is to be sent by the client to the server to successfully log in to the server following the protocol specified.
        Parameters:
        username - - The client username
        Returns:
        a String which contains the login message to be sent according to the protocol

      • cLIST

        public static java.lang.String cLIST()
        The method responsible for returning the LIST message which is to be sent by the client to the server to request a list of online users.
        Returns:
        a String which contains the LIST message to be sent according to the protocol

      • cRANK

        public static java.lang.String cRANK()

      • cQUEUE

        public static java.lang.String cQUEUE()
        The method responsible for returning the QUEUE message which is to be sent by the client to the server to request get into a QUEUE to start the Pentago game!
        Returns:
        a String which contains the QUEUE message to be sent according to the protocol

      • cMOVE

        public static java.lang.String cMOVE​(int index,
                                     int rotate)
        The method responsible for returning the MOVE message which is to be sent by the client to the server to play a move in the pentago game!
        Parameters:
        index - - the int value storing where the user wants to place the marble on the board.
        rotate - - the int value storing how the user want to rotate the Pentago board.
        Returns:
        a String which contains the MOVE message to be sent according to the protocol

      • cPING

        public static java.lang.String cPING()
        The method responsible for returning the PING message which is to be sent by the client to the server to check active connection. The server must immediately respond with a PONG to indicate active connection to the client.
        Returns:
        a String which contains the PING message to be sent according to the protocol

      • cPONG

        public static java.lang.String cPONG()
        The method responsible for returning the PONG message which is to be sent by the client to the server to check active connection. The client sends this responding to a PING message by the server
        Returns:
        a String which contains the PONG message to be sent according to the protocol

      • cQUIT

        public static java.lang.String cQUIT()
        The method responsible for returning the QUIT message which is to be sent by the client to quit the connection to the server.
        Returns:
        a String which contains the QUIT message to be sent according to the protocol
